ages_4_6.name: Pre-Reading and Writing Skills
ages_4_6.description: Introduction to alphabets, phonics, and simple writing exercises.

ages_4_6.name: Basic Math Concepts
ages_4_6.description: Introduction to numbers, counting, basic shapes, and simple addition and subtraction.

ages_4_6.name: Exploratory Science
ages_4_6.description: Basic experiments and activities to spark curiosity in natural phenomena.

ages_4_6.name: Creative Arts
ages_4_6.description: Art and music classes to develop creativity and fine motor skills.

ages_4_6.name: Social Skills
ages_4_6.description: Activities designed to enhance communication, sharing, and teamwork.

ages_7_10.name: Literacy and Language Arts
ages_7_10.description: Reading, writing, and comprehension skills, including vocabulary building.

ages_7_10.name: Mathematics
ages_7_10.description: Building on basic concepts to include multiplication, division, and problem-solving skills.

ages_7_10.name: Science Exploration
ages_7_10.description: More structured science education in biology, physics, and chemistry through experiments.

ages_7_10.name: Computer Basics
ages_7_10.description: Introduction to computer use, basic programming concepts, and digital literacy.

ages_7_10.name: Foreign Languages
ages_7_10.description: Introduction to foreign language learning, focusing on basic conversational skills and vocabulary.

ages_7_10.name: Arts and Crafts
ages_7_10.description: More advanced projects to develop artistic skills and creativity.

ages_11_13.name: Advanced Math
ages_11_13.description: Pre-algebra, geometry, and introduction to algebra.

ages_11_13.name: Science Labs
ages_11_13.description: More in-depth study of biology, chemistry, and physics with hands-on laboratory work.

ages_11_13.name: Language Arts
ages_11_13.description: Advanced reading and writing, including essay writing and literature study.

ages_11_13.name: Social Studies
ages_11_13.description: Geography, history, and civics to understand the world and its cultures.

ages_11_13.name: Technology and Coding
ages_11_13.description: Introduction to coding languages, web design, and more advanced computer skills.

ages_11_13.name: Study and Organizational Skills
ages_11_13.description: Courses to improve study habits, time management, and organizational skills.

ages_14_18.name: College Prep
ages_14_18.description: SAT/ACT preparation, college application and essay writing workshops.

ages_14_18.name: Advanced Placement (AP) or International Baccalaureate (IB) Coursework
ages_14_18.description: Advanced courses in various subjects for college credit.

ages_14_18.name: Career Exploration
ages_14_18.description: Workshops and courses in various career paths including STEM, arts, business, and trades.

ages_14_18.name: Leadership and Personal Development
ages_14_18.description: Programs to develop leadership skills, public speaking, and personal growth.

ages_14_18.name: Financial Literacy
ages_14_18.description: Understanding personal finance, budgeting, savings, and investment basics.

ages_14_18.name: Advanced Technology and Programming
ages_14_18.description: Specialized courses in software development, robotics, AI, and more.

cross_age_programs.name: Environmental Education
cross_age_programs.description: Programs focusing on sustainability, conservation, and respect for nature.

cross_age_programs.name: Community Service and Volunteering
cross_age_programs.description: Opportunities to develop empathy, responsibility, and community involvement.

cross_age_programs.name: Physical Education and Wellness
cross_age_programs.description: Sports, yoga, and mindfulness classes to promote physical health and mental well-being.

cross_age_programs.name: Cultural Exchange Programs
cross_age_programs.description: Programs that encourage understanding and appreciation of different cultures.
